com.github.dandelion.core.cache

Interface RequestCache

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractRequestCache, EhCacheRequestCache, MemoryRequestCache

    public interface RequestCache

    SPI for all implementation of RequestCache.

    Dandelion provides one out-of-the-box service provider:

    • MemoryRequestCache that uses the memory to store cache entries.
    Since:
    0.10.0
    Author:
    Romain Lespinasse, Thibault Duchateau

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DANDELION_CACHE_NAME 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clear()
      Clear all objects stored in cache.
      CacheEntry get(String cacheKey)
      Gets the set of assets to be displayed for a request stored under the passed cacheKey.

      String getCacheName() 
      AtomicLong getGetCount() 
      AtomicLong getHitCount() 
      AtomicLong getMissCount() 
      AtomicLong getPutCount() 
      void initCache(Context context)
      Initializes the configured service provider of the RequestCache SPI by using the Context.
      void put(String cacheKey, CacheEntry cacheElement)
      Puts the passed assets to the cache.

    • Method Detail

      • initCache

        void initCache(Context context)

        Initializes the configured service provider of the RequestCache SPI by using the Context.

        Parameters:
        context - The Context initialized in the DandelionFilter .

      • getCacheName

        String getCacheName()
        Returns:
        the name of the asset cache.

      • get

        CacheEntry get(String cacheKey)
        Gets the set of assets to be displayed for a request stored under the passed cacheKey.
        Parameters:
        cacheKey - The cache key under which the set of assets is stored in the cache.
        Returns:
        the assets associated with the cache key.

      • getAll

        Collection<CacheEntry> getAll()

      • put

        void put(String cacheKey,
       CacheEntry cacheElement)
        Puts the passed assets to the cache.
        Parameters:
        cacheKey - The key used to puts the assets to the cache.
        cacheElement - The assets to store in the cache.
